Package: com.android.build.gradle.api

[Java] Interface ApkVariant

    • com.android.build.gradle.api.BaseVariant
    • All Superinterfaces:
      BaseVariant

      A Build variant and all its public data.

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          Collection<File> getApkLibraries()
          Returns the list of jar files that are packaged in the APK.
          Collection<File> getCompileLibraries()
          Returns the list of jar files that are on the compile classpath.
          Dex getDex()
          Returns the Dex task.
          org.gradle.api.DefaultTask getInstall()
          Returns the install task for the variant.
          com.android.builder.model.SigningConfig getSigningConfig()
          Returns the com.android.builder.model.SigningConfig for this build variant, if one has been specified.
          org.gradle.api.DefaultTask getUninstall()
          Returns the uninstallation task.
          int getVersionCode()
          Return the app versionCode.
          String getVersionName()
          Return the app versionName or null if none found.
          boolean isSigningReady()
          Returns true if this variant has the information it needs to create a signed APK.

      • Inherited Methods Summary

          Inherited Methods 
          Methods inherited from class Name
          interface BaseVariant addJavaSourceFoldersToModel, addJavaSourceFoldersToModel, buildConfigField, getAidlCompile, getApplicationId, getAssemble, getBaseName, getBuildType, getCheckManifest, getDescription, getDirName, getFlavorName, getGenerateBuildConfig, getJavaCompile, getJavaCompiler, getMappingFile, getMergeAssets, getMergeResources, getMergedFlavor, getName, getNdkCompile, getObfuscation, getOutputs, getOutputsAreSigned, getPreBuild, getProcessJavaResources, getProductFlavors, getRenderscriptCompile, getSourceSets, registerJavaGeneratingTask, registerJavaGeneratingTask, registerResGeneratingTask, registerResGeneratingTask, resValue, setOutputsAreSigned

      • Method Detail

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public Collection<File> getApkLibraries()

          Returns the list of jar files that are packaged in the APK.

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public Collection<File> getCompileLibraries()

          Returns the list of jar files that are on the compile classpath. This does not include the runtime.

        • @com.android.annotations.Nullable public Dex getDex()

          Returns the Dex task.

        • @com.android.annotations.Nullable public org.gradle.api.DefaultTask getInstall()

          Returns the install task for the variant.

        • @com.android.annotations.Nullable public com.android.builder.model.SigningConfig getSigningConfig()

          Returns the com.android.builder.model.SigningConfig for this build variant, if one has been specified.

        • @com.android.annotations.Nullable public org.gradle.api.DefaultTask getUninstall()

          Returns the uninstallation task. For non-library project this is always true even if the APK is not created because signing isn't setup.

        • public int getVersionCode()

          Return the app versionCode. Even the value is not found, then 1 is returned as this is the implicit value that the platform would use. If not output define its own variant override then this is used for all outputs.

        • @com.android.annotations.Nullable public String getVersionName()

          Return the app versionName or null if none found.

        • public boolean isSigningReady()

          Returns true if this variant has the information it needs to create a signed APK.
